subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Marco Estrada, who almost had a no-hitter last week, lost his bid for a perfect game on Logan Forsythe’s eighth-inning infield single, but Chris Colabello’s 12th-inning homer gave the Blue Jays a 1-0 win over the Rays.
snippet: Marco Estrada, who almost had a no-hitter last week, lost his bid for a perfect game on Logan Forsythe’s eighth-inning infield single, but Chris Colabello’s 12th-inning homer gave the Blue Jays a 1-0 win over the Rays.
